title: I Love It Even More!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>You know, when you said you love μ’s before.... with me included, I was really happy, Ruby-chan. After that, I think I fell in love with μ’s even more. I thought there’s no way I could love μ’s more than this, but I feel like somehow it’s exactly what happened!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby felt the same way. Seeing the note you wrote on the things you love about Aqours made me feel really proud to be a member of it and made me love it even more, Hanayo-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>And so, I was making notes on the things I love about Nijigaku....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh!? Me too! Ruby was hoping we could talk about Nijigaku today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ehehe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then, let’s talk a bunch while we watch their videos, okay~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, leave the playlist to me! Ruby is compiling a list of my favorite videos~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
